linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5, 2.4 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan-capable GPU from NVIDIA, AMD, or Intel
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Setzt 64-Bit-Prozessor und -Betriebssystem voraus
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5, 2.4 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan-capable GPU from NVIDIA, AMD, or Intel
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Setzt 64-Bit-Prozessor und -Betriebssystem voraus

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 440 oder Intel HD 5000 oder vergleichbare AMD
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9.2
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 440 oder Intel HD 5000 oder vergleichbare AMD
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 2.5GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce or AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 2.5GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
